body.name: Freshscent 1.0 oz Bar Soap (200 Pack) Hotel Travel Size, Individually Wrapped, Vegetable Based, Bulk Amenities and Toiletries for Hospitality
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 16 mins
features: 200 Bars per package. Sturdy cardboard well marked packaging is ideal for storage or shipping. Contents are easily accessible for distribution to rooms or on an assembly line for kit packaging.

QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Bars have a light unisex fragrance. Specially formulated for a gentle body and face wash. Made with natural palm oil (vegetable based) and no animal by-products (Vegan). No harmful ingredients and NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS.
INDIVIDUALLY WRAPPED - Each bar is individually wrapped in air tight and tamper resistant packaging to ensure freshness and to extend shelf life.

FRESHSCENT - The Freshscent brand has been recognized and respected for almost five decades throughout the hospitality and healthcare industries for quality and integrity while maintaining competitive pricing.
DONATIONS - Freshscent Bar Soap as well as all packaging are perfect for donating to your favorite charity or handing out to the homeless. Distribute in bulk, individually or packed in kits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: In the hospitality industry, little items make a big impression. Our collection of toiletries feature high-quality ingredients, meticulously created packaging and ease of use – all designed to enrich the guest experience.

In the hospitality industry, little items make a big impression. Our collection of toiletries feature high-quality ingredients, meticulously created packaging and ease of use – all designed to enrich the guest experience.

PRODUCT FEATURES PAMPER YOUR GUESTS Give your guests a relaxing, pampering experience. Formulated and designed with industry input, and specially crafted for hotels, Airbnb, VRBO, Vacation Rental Properties, Spas, Gyms, and charities. REFRESHING SCENT Our refreshing blend of ingredients features a clean, revitalizing scent ideal for all ages and genders. Captivate your guests senses with our subtle and fresh fragrance designed to revitalize and renew. HIGHEST QUALITY Because you only have one chance to make a first impression, our products feature only the highest-quality ingredients, superior packaging, and ease of use – all to provide a superior guest experience. MESS FREE & CRUELTY FREE Our mess-free packaging has no small foil seals to clog drains or stick to vanity/bathing areas. No animal byproducts are used, and we never test on animals.
SHAMPOO CONDITIONER BODY WASH LOTION 0.5 oz BAR SOAP HOTEL KIT Packaging 50 or 100 Pack 50 or 100 Pack 50 or 100 Pack 50 or 100 Pack 100 Pack 250

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very great soap
reviews.reviewText: Good for guest who has sensitive skin or not like fragrance products. Very well worth for the price .I will buy again more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for the homeless
reviews.reviewText: At my church, we put together what we call “Blessing Bags”. They include essential toiletries and other items. We put them all in a Ziploc bag and hand them out as we see a homeless person on the street. These bars of soap were perfect companion items for our “Blessing Bags. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Quality made soap, packaging, professional. Does its job, last two showers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars these are fine, but I wish there was an unscented option
reviews.reviewText: Tried this soap recently and it works fine. I prefer unscented. The smell is not terrible; I just don't like scented soaps. I plan to use it for travel and while backpacking where I don't want to carry a big bar of soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this soap for an Airbnb, it serves it's purpose no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So hotel motel style soap, it's gets the job done smells of clean cotton or linens it's milled soap and just gritty enough to be a good lighty abrasive to help get the job done. Cleans well as you would hope after a shower I feel clean, bar didn't break or dissolve in one go, as a hand soap I don't notice any bathroom smells after using it and would trust my hands are mess free, it won't clean out your fingernails alone without a scrubber, and for those who think soaps need lather that's not actually true, it is low lather and takes a bit of rinsing though this only ensures your hands are clean, leaves a pleasant fresh scent that's not over bearing. Individually wrapped which is great for guests and the single man who's cheap like me.Well worth it considering the alternatives out there. Soap shouldn't cost much and should at the very least make you smell clean this does the job well enough. If I went to a hotel or motel I'd be happy to find this for a hot shower or the cleanup stage of the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soap for a Cause and Adventure - From African Journeys to Overseas Delights!
reviews.reviewText: Hello, fellow adventurers and community champions, gather 'round for the remarkable tale of how the Freshscent 0.5 oz Bar Soap transformed my overseas escapades into a soap-laden adventure of compassion and hygiene education! From handwashing harmony to travel triumphs, let's dive into the world of soap empowerment and the heartwarming journeys it sparked.The Lightweight Wanderer: Imagine this – a suitcase filled with dreams and destinations, and nestled within, a treasure trove of individually wrapped bar soaps. These soaps are like feather-light gems that don't just clean, they carry tales of kindness and learning across continents.Individually Wrapped Stars: Let's talk about the individually wrapped design – it's like each soap is a gift, waiting to be unwrapped by eager hands. Whether in a hotel room or amidst community health education classes in Africa, these soaps ensure that cleanliness and care go hand in hand.African Adventures in Soap: Now, here's where the magic truly unfolds – community health education classes in Africa. With these soaps, teaching local children the art of handwashing becomes a gift of empowerment. It's like spreading a wave of hygiene awareness that touches hearts and transforms lives.Travel Hero for a Cause: Beyond the soap, there's a greater cause at play – these soap bars are like allies in the battle for better health. They accompany you on overseas missions, reminding you that even the smallest actions can create ripples of positive change. Their presence is a testament to your dedication to making a difference.Soap-tastic Pros: In the grand tapestry of soap journeys, the Freshscent 0.5 oz Bar Soap deserves an applause of five stars. It's like soap that transforms into a tool of empowerment, whether you're overseas teaching health or simply embarking on new adventures. If you're ready to embrace soap's ability to foster hygiene education and embark on travel triumphs, then these soaps are your companions in compassion!Pros:Lightweight and easy to pack for overseas travelIndividually wrapped design adds a touch of delightPerfect for community health education, like teaching handwashing in AfricaDid this review inspire you to embark on your own soap adventure? Give it a thumbs-up and let's celebrate soap's power to create change and unforgettable journeys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very sudsy
reviews.reviewText: It’s received exactly what I purchased which were a lot of small bars of soap. I don’t love them though. The size is good but they don’t get very sudsy. I’m a little disappointed by that. But it got me clean and I guess that’s what matters.
